      • onKeyEvent

        public void onKeyEvent(java.lang.String ke)
        Changes direction of worm based on the input keystroke.
        Overrides:
        onKeyEvent in class javalib.impworld.World

      • dirChange

        public boolean dirChange(java.lang.String ke)
        Determines if the worm should change direction when a key is pressed. Direction will not change if it is already the worm's current direction or the worm is going in the opposite direction (as the worm cannot go backwards onto itself).

      • oppDir

        public java.lang.String oppDir(java.lang.String ke)
        Returns the opposite direction of the given direction.

      • onTick

        public void onTick()
        Called at every tick of the game clock. Moves the worm based on a given direction, keeps track of time, places special food at certain time intervals, and determines what state the game is in.
        Overrides:
        onTick in class javalib.impworld.World

      • strobeDirt

        public javalib.worldimages.WorldImage strobeDirt()
        Creates a strobing image for the world background.

      • makeImage

        public javalib.worldimages.WorldImage makeImage()
        Draws the world image, food, and worm onto the canvas.
        Specified by:
        makeImage in class javalib.impworld.World
        Returns:
        the image that represents this world at this moment

      • worldEnds

        public javalib.worldimages.WorldEnd worldEnds()
        Handles the end of the game. The game ends when the worm is either out of bounds or eats itself.
        Overrides:
        worldEnds in class javalib.impworld.World
        Returns:
        pair (true, last image) or (false, any image)
